page.title: 03How People Move About.
page.content: The old railway was built in 1845.It was closed down about 1964.By Dawsons the garage in Burley.There is a piece of the railway left opposite the garage.There is a taxi that comes to Burley to drop off children at the school.The taxi is from Lyndhurst.That is the only taxi that comes to Burley.There is a bus service through Burley, it comes 24 times a day.Bus numbers are 115 and 116 leaving Bounemouth the bus changes at Christchurch then it goes on to Burley and Ringwood and returns via Burley to Christchurch and changes then to Bournemouth.The X1 starts at Bournemouth down to Burley and goes to Southampton,and then returns.There are wagonette rides in Burley.There is a private hire too.The wagonette takes tourists round Burley on all kinds of rides.Most people have their own cars.
